post.body: i love you for posting that and making me laugh really hard. (:
loved the show, and rly enjoyed talking to shawn (:
*waits on angel*
thinks if shawn can read this, he should let me know about the show xD
is trying to find something to do until the show...
is looking forward to BELLA MORTE! 8D
is dying.........terrified.
is sick of feeling icky.
is home, sore, but happy. ilovejerimiah 8D
is heading to mums, and waiting on shawn to tell her what to do about her throat.
thinks things are going to work....
feels loved by Shawn 8D
is amused at shawn a lot today. He makes me happy. :)
has enjoyed today being World AIDS day, and keeping up with Shawn's travels. Has not enjoyed being stressed out to the max.
has had a stressful day. Happy WAD! 8D
is losing him.
is going to sort this mess out today.
wishes she would stop fucking things up for her and J...*epicsigh*
hopes shawn and gwenn have loads of fun travelling.
wants to kmow what sign means, and thinks shawn should tell her. (:
is at the short pump mall wandering aimlessly, waiting on kat.
is heading to Richmond to see Kat today! And beat Rick up. 8D Possibly out with J later<3
is excited about tomorrow. (:
was enjoying mypetvirus videos, but now has to retrieve Jeremiah. 8D
is waiting on J...*sigh*
is bleh and tired.
is bleh.
thinks Shawn needs to give up sweetener packet football xD
is in town and bored. D:
is dealing with another sore throat, and trying to figure out today's schedule.
is at angels watching stepbrothers xD
is being lazy today. o_O
is heading to java java for her demise...or not. We'll see.
is running off to save Dev. D:
is starting 2009 of being lazy. lol.
is downtown!
is still trying to figure out new year's eve plans. Will be downtown for a bit shortly.
is going to nap. (:
is at bodos with brad! (:
is excited cause Brad's home for the week. (:
enjoys spending time with her boys. (:
is quite confused, but knows she's gonna see Jen today. Yay! one thing set in stone. -__-
is freezing and has no idea what she's doing today. hrm...
is hiding from the excited christmas people today. -__-
is home, feels like hell, and is going to hide under the covers soon. =/
loves you. Really.
is going to go nuts today. YAY! -___
thinks her life is far too much like twilight. D:
is absolutely absurd and stupid, and really would love to know why Christmas always gets fucked up...
is being really ridiculous and stupid.
